service.name: app-issue-tracker
service.description: File-based issue tracking system with AI investigation using Claude Code - no database required

n8n.description: Optional workflow automation for advanced investigation

qdrant.description: Optional vector database for semantic search of issues

steps.name: create-issues-structure
steps.run: mkdir -p issues/{open,investigating,in-progress,fixed,closed,failed,templates}

steps.name: migrate-from-database
steps.run: bash scripts/migrate-to-files.sh migrate || echo '  Migration completed or no database found'
steps.description: Migrate existing PostgreSQL data to YAML files

steps.name: install-management-cli
steps.run: ln -sf $(pwd)/issues/manage.sh ~/.local/bin/issue-manager 2>/dev/null || echo '  Management CLI available at ./issues/manage.sh'
steps.description: Make issue management CLI globally available

steps.name: install-main-cli
steps.run: ln -sf $(pwd)/cli/app-issue-tracker-v2.sh ~/.local/bin/app-issue-tracker-v2 2>/dev/null || echo '  CLI available at ./cli/app-issue-tracker-v2.sh'

steps.name: build-file-api
steps.run: cd api && go mod download && go build -o app-issue-tracker-api main.go

steps.name: setup-vector-search
steps.run: if command -v curl >/dev/null && curl -s http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[qdrant]}/collections >/dev/null 2>&1; then curl -X PUT "http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[qdrant]}/collections/issues" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"vectors": {"size": 1536, "distance": "Cosine"}}' >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; echo '  Qdrant collection setup completed'; else echo '  Qdrant not available, semantic search disabled'; fi

steps.name: show-file-urls
steps.run:
echo 'üìÅ File-Based Issue Tracker initialized
  üìä Management: ./issues/manage.sh status
  üåê API: http://localhost:${SERVICE_PORT}
  üéØ CLI: app-issue-tracker-v2 --help
  üìÇ Issues: ./issues/
  üìù Templates: ./issues/templates/

üí° Create issues with:
  app-issue-tracker-v2 create --title "Issue title" --priority high
  ./issues/manage.sh add
  cp issues/templates/bug-template.yaml issues/open/123-new.yaml'

develop.description: Start file-based issue tracker with Go API server

steps.name: start-file-api
steps.run: cd api && PORT=$SERVICE_PORT ./app-issue-tracker-api &

steps.name: start-ui-server
steps.run: cd ui && python3 -m http.server $UI_PORT > ../logs/ui.log 2>&1 &

steps.name: wait-for-api
steps.run: sleep 2 && curl -sf http://localhost:$SERVICE_PORT/health > /dev/null
steps.description: Wait for API server to be ready

steps.name: show-running-services
steps.run:
echo 'üìÅ File-Based Issue Tracker running:
  üåê Web UI: http://localhost:$UI_PORT
  üì° API: http://localhost:$SERVICE_PORT
  üéØ CLI: app-issue-tracker-v2 --help
  üìä Management: ./issues/manage.sh status

üìù Create issues:
  app-issue-tracker-v2 create --title "Bug title" --priority high
  ./issues/manage.sh add

üìÇ File Operations:
  ls issues/open/*.yaml
  mv issues/open/001-bug.yaml issues/investigating/
  ./issues/manage.sh search "keyword"'
steps.description: Display all running services and usage examples

steps.name: test-file-structure
steps.run: test -d issues/open && test -d issues/templates && echo '‚úì Directory structure exists' || (echo '‚úó Directory structure missing' && exit 1)

steps.name: test-templates
steps.run: test -f issues/templates/bug-template.yaml && test -f issues/templates/feature-template.yaml && echo '‚úì Templates exist' || (echo '‚úó Templates missing' && exit 1)

steps.name: test-management-cli
steps.run: bash issues/manage.sh status

steps.name: test-go-build
steps.run: cd api && go build -o test-build main_file_based.go && rm test-build
steps.description: Test Go compilation for file-based API

steps.name: test-file-api-health
steps.run: curl -sf http://localhost:$SERVICE_PORT/health && echo '‚úì File-based API healthy' || echo '‚ö† API not running (expected if not started)'

steps.name: test-issue-creation
steps.run: bash -c 'cd "$PWD" && timeout 10s ./issues/manage.sh status > /dev/null && echo "‚úì Issue management working"' || echo '‚ö† Issue management test skipped'

steps.name: test-main-cli
steps.run: bash cli/app-issue-tracker-v2.sh --help | grep -q 'File-Based Issue Management' && echo '‚úì CLI v2 working' || echo '‚ö† CLI test skipped'

steps.name: stop-file-api
steps.run: pkill -f 'app-issue-tracker-file-api' || true

steps.name: stop-ui-server
steps.run: pkill -f 'python3.*http.server.*$UI_PORT' || true

steps.name: confirm-stop
steps.run: echo 'üõë File-Based Issue Tracker services stopped\nüìÅ Issue files remain at: ./issues/'

clean.description: Clean up file-based issue tracker data

steps.name: archive-issues
steps.run: bash issues/manage.sh archive 90 || echo 'Archive completed'

steps.name: backup-before-clean
steps.run: mkdir -p backup/clean-$(date +%Y%m%d) && cp -r issues backup/clean-$(date +%Y%m%d)/ && echo 'Backup created in backup/clean-$(date +%Y%m%d)/'
